page.title: 02TADWORTH VILLAGE WEEK
page.content: Tadworth Village Week occurs each year at about the same time. It is organised and run by the{Tadworth {Village Association.}Membership is open to all local residents and organisations free of charge. A committee is elected consisting of a chairperson, a treasurer, a secretary and 6 other members. The objective of Village Week, as it says in it's programme, is to get{'local peopleto {meet each other and enjoy themselves.' The{theme}this year was{'The Good {Old Days'}and people are asked to show this on their floats and in their dress in the Carnival Procession. Although not in Village Week itself the first event is the selection of the{Tadworth Rainbow Princess}from the local girls. The winner leads the {Carnival Procession}through Tadworth.
